item.title: Blogging: a new power of R-studio
item.description: Back in 2007, I downloaded R for the first time during a statistical class in my BSc degree. However, I did not see much necessity of R and the interface was not friendly. At that time, I had no idea about the power of R and R-studio software. When I joined the University of Nebraska-Lincoln in 2014, I took statistics class that used SAS as standard software. With SAS, I liked using for ANOVA, but I found challenging to conduct quantitative data analysis and plotting regression curves.
